question: This state plans to introduce PGs for cattle to boost milk production.
explanation: Haryana State Government announced to set up 'PGs (Paying Guests) for cattle', through which people living in high-rises or in urban areas will be able to rear their own cattle and produce quality milk for their personal consumption. Under this initiative, Haryana State Government will earmark 50 to 100 acres of land for dairy business. The Government is taking several measure to boost dairy industry in the state with an objective to make Haryana as the best state in milk production.
